error.message:
Oops! An unexpected error occurred. Our development team has been notified and is working to resolve it. If you continue to encounter difficulties, please contact our support team.
ID:
error.multiple_connection_warning: You have been disconnected due to simultaneous use of the account on another device.
error.new_version:
New version available!
Update now to enjoy new features and performance improvements.
error.no_have_resource: You do not have enough resources for this action!

profile.title: PROFILE
profile.error_exist_name: The entered name is already in use.
profile.reset_error: During exploration, collection, or hunting, it is not possible to reset your points.

explore.title: EXPLORE
explore.no_reward: You have already discovered everything that exists on the island!
explore.cancel_exploration: Are you sure you want to cancel the exploration?

pvp.text:
üëã Hello castaway, welcome to the Arena! Here you can challenge other players and showcase your skills. üéÅ Additionally, at the end of the Arena event, you will receive rewards based on your score rank. üèÜ

The score rank is based on your performance during the arena and includes the following levels:
ü•âBronze (300 to 999 points)
ü•àSilver (1000 to 1799 points)
ü•áGold (1800 to 2799 points)
üèÖPlatinum (2800 points or more)

The rewards for the 5rd Arena SEASON winners will also receive a quantity of gold and gems based on their score rank. The rewards will be as follows:
ü•âBronze - 50K gold and 50 gems
ü•àSilver - 250K gold and 100 gems
ü•áGold - 500K gold and 150 gems
üèÖPlatinum - 1M gold and 200 gems

Additionally, players who rank in the TOP 3 will also receive an additional quantity of gold and gems:
ü•áTOP 1 - 6M gold and 350 gems
ü•àTOP 2 - 4M gold and 300 gems
ü•âTOP 3 - 2M gold and 250 gems

Good luck in your battles! üçÄ

battle.title: BATTLE
battle.victory: YOU WON, CLICK HERE TO EXIT
battle.lose: YOU LOST, CLICK HERE TO EXIT
battle.escape_text_player:
Escaping the battle may result in the loss of trophies and be interpreted as a defeat.

Are you sure you want to escape?
battle.escape_text_boss:
Escaping the battle may result in the loss of today's boss rewards.

Are you sure you want to escape?

pets.no_wood_camp_fire: Your campfire is extinguished! To hatch your eggs, you need to light it again. Make sure to replenish the campfire with enough firewood to keep it burning long enough to hatch your eggs.
pets.delete_pet:
Are you sure you want to delete your pet?

This action is permanent, and all information related to your pet will be erased.

easter.title: EASTER
easter.text:
Start: 2023-04-08 00:00:00 (UTC +00:00)
End: 2023-04-22 23:59:59 (UTC +00:00)

To earn fragments, you must collect them here daily or hunt rabbits in the hunting tab.
Prizes:
1 - 5M gold, 600 gems, 6 special Easter eggs.
2 - 4M gold, 500 gems, 5 special Easter eggs.
3 - 3M gold, 400 gems, 4 special Easter eggs.
4 - 2M gold, 300 gems, 3 special Easter eggs.
5 - 1M gold, 200 gems, 2 special Easter eggs.

The remaining players will receive:
- 250K gold, 100 gems, 1 special Easter egg.
